title: Egypt Aswan+Luxor+Red Sea Red Sea+Cairo+Alexander 12-Day Group Tour (5 Diamonds)
description: [Official Flagship Star Fun Group] 25 people capped | Full meal with visa tips | 3 nights Nile cruise+3 nights Red Sea all-inclusive resort +1 night in ancient capital of Bis | Upgraded Inland Airplane | High Quality Chinese Tour Team | Seven Temples+Free Program
features:
[2020 self operated one price package upgrade: Egypt five-star Nile cruise exploration 12 day inland aircraft boutique group]

[25 people capped group | give special items | more comfortable journey]

*It has been popular and praised for many years, and more than 6000 people have traveled！！ The circuit can be imitated, the quality cannot be compared with the same period*


☆【[Upgrade Description]】In 2020, the star products will be upgraded again. You can't go to Egypt only once in your life just to look at the surface. The high-quality tour guides we have cooperated with for many years will make your trip worthwhile!

Heavy upgrade in winter · New style for group tour

☆[Maximum number of people]The number of the whole group is 25. Say goodbye to the crowded super group!！
☆[Living in Luxor]One night stay on the banks of the Nile in Luxor, private time in the ancient capital of Thebes!

☆[Super Long Tour]The Egyptian History Museum has a super long tour of 3 hours, leaving no regrets!

☆[Special Projects]Take the carriage to visit the ancient capital of Thebes in the morning
☆[Special arrangements]Learn to draw hieroglyphs and make your own papyrus painting! (1 piece for each person)

☆[Bus upgrade]Teams with more than 16 tourists directly upgrade Benz brand buses!

 Classic Internally Flying Nile Cruise: Seven Temples+Five Scenic Spots

☆[Characteristic theme]Nile cruise ships cross the millennium civilization+romantic Red Sea holiday!>☆[Five Scenic Spots]Cairo+Aswan+Luxor+Red Sea+Alexandria, a true panoramic tour!
☆[Seven Temples]Enter the six classic temples (exclusive for two cruise ships)+choose Abu Simbel Temple!
☆[Important Scenic Spots]Pyramid+Sphinx+Egyptian Museum can not be without one!

☆[Cruise accommodation]Three night stay of Nile cruise, year-round cooperation quality cruise (river view room standard room)!

☆[Red Sea Holiday]Red Sea Beach designated Excellence Resort for 3 consecutive nights, a real vacation trip!

☆[Upgrade Internal Flight]Upgrade a section of inland plane

 Relax, book and travel with confidence  Including visa tips of more than 1000 yuan

☆[Convenient visa]You do not need to submit the original passport for handling landing visa with the group!
☆[Including tips]Nile cruise service!
☆[Refreshing Meals]Including the whole course dinner in Egypt

☆[Safety assurance]many yearsCooperate with local well-known agencies+high-quality licensed tour guides!

☆[Service Equipment]On board WIFI meets the Internet demand!


Special note: In order to enrich the travel experience, from now on, the free Nile sailing project will be changed to a free morning tour of the ancient capital of Thebes by Luxor in a carriage. No separate notice will be given for the change.
fees:
Expenses include
transportation

Round trip economy class air ticket payment tax

Accomodation

Hotel accommodation expenses listed in the itinerary

Hotel Standard 2 Rooms

Meals

Meals listed in the itinerary. For details, please refer to the itinerary recommended/schedule, and whether airline meals are charged, please refer to the airline regulations

Tickets and Ground Programs

Tourist car for the first big ticket of the scenic spots listed in the itinerary

Attendant service staff

Chinese tour guides and local Chinese tour guides

Child price standard

Age 2-12 (not included), does not occupy a bed, service standards are the same as adults

Self-care expenses
Child surcharges

The prices for children in the group are all without bed or breakfast. If you need to share a bed, please select the option to make up for the child on the follow-up page of the booking; 1 adult is traveling with 1 child, and the child must occupy a bed. Please select the option to make up for the difference.

supplementing

Customs taxation of personal items entering and leaving the country; check-in and storage fees for overweight luggage; personal expenses such as laundry, hairdressing, telephone, fax, pay TV, drinks, tobacco and alcohol in the hotel; car service during free time; products providing guided tours are not accompanied during free time; local participation at own expense and other items not included in the “fee included”

Single room

Recommended activities for reference (at your own expense)
activityReference pricestating
Philae Temple Sound and Light Show70 USD/person (2-5 people)70 USD/person (2-5 people) 65 USD/person (6-9 people) 60 USD/person (10 people or more) The fee includes: Fares, guide fees, and attraction tickets
Pyramid Sound & Light Show75 USD/person (2-5 people)In the modern sound and light combination, feel the vicissitudes of history more than 4 thousand years ago. Includes shuttle service, English-speaking tour guide, and tickets.
75 USD/person (2-5 people)
65 USD/person (6 people or more)
Night trip on the Nile85 US dollars/person (4-9 people)In the evening, take a cruise on the Nile River to enjoy the scenery on both sides of the river, and have dinner on the boat (drinks not included) and enjoy local special performances (performances are suspended during Ramadan). Pier transfers and a Chinese-speaking guide escort service are included.
85 USD/person (4-9 people)
75 USD/person (10 people or more)
Abu Simbel temple145 US dollars/personDepart around 4 a.m., and go and return under the Desert Guard. The Abu Simbel Temple is a tourist focus of Aswan. It was built by the great pharaoh Ramses II (Ramses II) of ancient Egypt, and is a protected site from the era of the pharaohs of the new empire. Includes fare, Chinese tour guide and explanation service, and attraction tickets:
145 USD/person (6-9 people)
140 USD/person (10-14 people)
125 USD/person (15 people or more)
Aswan Nubian Village Tour50 USD/person (4-7 people)Take a boat ride to Aswan's unique "minority" village, Nubia Village. Here you can experience the ancient Nubian civilization, visit colorful houses unique to Nubians, learn the local language, and visit the family. Includes a pier transfer service, a Chinese-speaking guide, and Nubian village specialty drinks and camel rides.
50 USD/person (4-7 people)
45 USD/person (8 people or more)
Four-wheel drive jeep sand flushing90 US dollars/person (4-7 people)At around 2:30 in the afternoon, take a four-wheel drive from the hotel and head to Egypt's unique eastern desert to wash the sand. Let go of yourself in the empty next door. Climb to the top of the sand dunes to watch the sunset. Then go to the ancient Bedouin village to explore the Bedouin life. And experience the fun of camel riding. If you're lucky on the way back, you can also see the sky full of stars.
Note: This is a stimulating item. The 4WD is bumpy during driving, and there are certain risks. Elderly, weak, women, children, and patients should participate carefully! Please be safe when getting on and off camels! If the car seat is not equipped with a seat belt, please refuse to get on the car and ask for a refund of the corresponding fee!
$90 per person (4-7 people)
$80 per person (8 people or more)
The fee includes: 4*4 jeep fare, guide fee, attraction tickets, BBQ yakiniku dinner
Gifton Island Excursion80 US dollars/person (10 people or more)Depart from the hotel around 8:30 in the morning, head to the pier, board the yacht, and enter the beautiful Red Sea. Charter a boat to enjoy the Red Sea scenery without sharing a boat with other tourists. Feeding seagulls, fishing, and snorkeling, all kinds of activities are at your disposal. The yacht provides snorkeling equipment, fishing basic equipment. Enjoy a simple lunch on board the boat at noon. Includes transfers, English-speaking guide escort services.
Note: Please
be safe when going out to sea and disembarking on a yacht. Do not be crowded in line and be careful not to skate. Do not make dangerous actions without the captain and lifeguards making arrangements. (Since the yacht is fast and the sea is bumpy, the elderly, young women, children and patients should participate carefully!)
80 US dollars/person (10 people or more)
Sindbad Submarine115 USD/person (from 2 people)Go to the pier, take a speedboat to the submarine platform, take a submarine to dive into the 7-meter deep Red Sea, and enjoy the mysterious and beautiful underwater world of the Red Sea. There is also a diver's show for you to feed fish from the bottom of the sea. Including pick-up and drop-off, accompanied by Chinese tour guide
Note:
This project is exciting. Because of the certain pressure under the sea, the old, weak, women, children and patients should participate carefully!
115 USD/person (from 2 people)
Red Sea Glass Boat Tour70 USD/person (from 4 people)Take a specially customized cruise ship with a large viewing window at the bottom of the cruise ship, which is convenient for enjoying the wonderful underwater world. Transfer included, accompanied by a Chinese guide
Note: Please
be safe when disembarking and disembarking. Do not be crowded or slippery in line.
70 USD/person (from 4 people)
Luxor hot air balloons165 USD/person (2-3 people)Depart from the hotel to the pier around 5 in the morning and take a boat to the west bank of the Nile. Hot coffee, tea, and small snacks are prepared on board the boat. Ride a hot air balloon to meet the sunrise and overlook Luxor. Experience a different kind of Luxor from above by visiting attractions such as Hubble City, the Queen's Temple, and the Valley of the Kings. After landing, a small celebration ceremony will be held and guests will be presented with certificates. Then return to the hotel by car.
Special Reminder:
1. The hot air balloon program is a high-risk event, so please choose to participate carefully according to your own circumstances.
2. The itinerary is for reference only and is subject to the specific weather conditions of the day. If you are unable to ride a hot air balloon due to weather conditions, the original price will be refunded!
3. Children under 7 years old cannot participate in this program
4. The tour leader and guide will not be accompanied during the balloon period. Please wait patiently in order to get on and off the hot air balloon. Never make dangerous moves in a hurry to get on and off the hot air balloon to avoid accidents. Fly and cherish! 165 USD/person (2-3 people)

150 USD/person (4 people or more)
The programs listed above are all recommended programs. Guests choose to participate according to the principle of “voluntary self-expense”. Some programs may not be able to take place if the number of participants or resources are insufficient.
